mapper.select: SELECT STCD FROM ${sensorType} GROUP BY STCD

SELECT STCD as '传感器ID',TM as '时间点',DRP AS '5分钟时段雨量',DYP ,UC AS '风向',US AS '风速',AI AS '气温',MST AS '空气湿度',FL AS '气压',GZ AS '光照',INTV FROM `st_pptn_r` where STCD= ${weatherSensorId} order by TM desc limit 1

SELECT STCD as '传感器ID',TM as '时间点',DRP AS '5分钟时段雨量',DYP AS DYP,UC AS '风向',US AS '风速',AI AS '气温',MST AS '空气湿度',FL AS '气压',GZ AS '光照',INTV AS INTV FROM `st_pptn_r` where STCD= #{weatherSensorId} order by TM desc limit 1
SELECT STCD as '传感器ID', TM as '时间',GTP as '土壤温度',M10 as '土壤湿度',COND as '电导率',PH as 'PH值',TN as '氮',TP as '磷',K as '钾',VT as '电压' FROM st_soil_r where STCD= #{soilSensorId} order by TM desc limit 1
SELECT STCD as '传感器ID', TM as '时间',${curveType} as ${curveName} FROM ${sensorTable} where STCD= #{sensorId} order by TM desc limit 15
